dct_description_sm: On verso of map: Caernarvon-shire. [Descriptive text.].
Bar scale on map given in "The scale of miles;" bar scales on inset maps both given in "A scale of pases."
Bird's eye views of Caernarvon and Bangor.
Decorative border and cartouches, ships in battle vignette, sea monsters, Poseidon-like figure.
This map also used for his Theatre of the empire of Great Britaine.
Inset maps: Caernarvon (includes index: Places); Bangor (north oriented toward left of inset).
From Speed's Theatre of the Empire of Great Britian, London, 1611.
dct_publisher_sm: are to be solde in Popes head Alley... by Iohn Sudbury and Georg Humble
